page.title: 18A DAY IN THE LIFE
page.content: {MRS HODSON FROM THE "OLDE BAKERY" Mrs Hodson owns Raunds bakery/cafe. The bakery does not have the ovens to bake its own bread but has it delivered from a Kettering bakery.The bakery does bake 2/3 of its own cakes. Her assistant arrives at 7:30 am and starts work straight away.Mrs Hodson arrives at 7:45 am.Before the shop opens at 9:00 am they have to prepare the cafe's dinner,turn the ovens on, make the fresh cream,put out the stock and make sure the shop is clean.When this is done it is time for the shop to open.On average 100 loaves are sold a day of which sliced white are the most popular.The most popular cakes are fresh cream cakes.They have many regular customers,alot of them buy brown or wholemeal bread.
